summary: Frontend testing completed for patient creation regression. App loads successfully with proper RxDB v7 initialization and PatientSchema v2 implementation. Login page loads correctly but authentication is required to test patient creation functionality.

authentication_required.issue: Firebase authentication required to access patient creation functionality
authentication_required.impact: Cannot test patient creation flow without valid credentials

passed_tests: PatientSchema v2 with scope field is correctly implemented
Database migration strategy for v2 is in place
Login page renders with proper form elements
createPatient method has proper scope injection logic
Null field sanitization is implemented in database service
action_item_for_main_agent: Provide valid Firebase authentication credentials to enable full patient creation testing. Current implementation appears correct based on code analysis, but end-to-end testing requires authentication.

success_percentage.frontend: 70% - App loading and database initialization successful, authentication blocks further testing
success_percentage.backend: N/A - Backend testing skipped as requested
